Title: Relates to requiring certain individuals to wait twenty-four hours before getting a face tattoo
Summary: Requires individuals between eighteen and twenty-one years of age to wait a minimum of twenty-four hours after making a request for a face tattoo.
LawCode: Add ยง468, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain individuals to wait twenty-four hours before getting a face tattoo
